flawed_nl_solution:
Tom needs to pass for 6000 - 4200 = <<6000-4200=1800>>1800 yards to beat the record.
Therefore, he needs to average 1800 yards / 6 games = <<1800/6=3000>>3000 yards per game.
#### 3000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
